Proof.

Given the definition of hâ„hitalic_h, we have that Hâ¢(ğ’™â‹†)=0ğ»superscriptğ’™â‹†0H(\boldsymbol{x}^{\star})=0italic_H ( bold_italic_x start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT â‹† end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ) = 0. Moreover, hâ¢(ğ’™,ğƒ)â‰¥fâ¢(ğ’™,ğƒ)âˆ’fâ¢(ğ’™â‹†,ğƒ)â„ğ’™ğƒğ‘“ğ’™ğƒğ‘“superscriptğ’™â‹†ğƒh(\boldsymbol{x},\boldsymbol{\xi})\geq f(\boldsymbol{x},\boldsymbol{\xi})-f(% \boldsymbol{x}^{\star},\boldsymbol{\xi})italic_h ( bold_italic_x , bold_italic_Î¾ ) â‰¥ italic_f ( bold_italic_x , bold_italic_Î¾ ) - italic_f ( bold_italic_x start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT â‹† end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT , bold_italic_Î¾ ), hence ğ”¼â¢[Hâ¢(ğ’™t)]â‰¥ğ”¼â¢[Fâ¢(ğ’™t)]âˆ’Fâ¢(ğ’™â‹†)ğ”¼delimited-[]ğ»subscriptğ’™ğ‘¡ğ”¼delimited-[]ğ¹subscriptğ’™ğ‘¡ğ¹superscriptğ’™â‹†\mathbb{E}[H(\boldsymbol{x}_{t})]\geq\mathbb{E}[F(\boldsymbol{x}_{t})]-F(% \boldsymbol{x}^{\star})blackboard_E [ italic_H ( bold_italic_x start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ) ] â‰¥ blackboard_E [ italic_F ( bold_italic_x start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ) ] - italic_F ( bold_italic_x start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT â‹† end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ) for any tğ‘¡titalic_t.

We have that

âˆ‚hâ¢(ğ’™,ğƒ)={âˆ‚fâ¢(ğ’™,ğƒ),Â ifÂ â¢fâ¢(ğ’™,ğƒ)>fâ¢(ğ’™â‹†,ğƒ){0},Â ifÂ â¢fâ¢(ğ’™,ğƒ)<fâ¢(ğ’™â‹†,ğƒ){Î±â¢ğ’ˆ:Î±âˆˆ[0,1],ğ’ˆâˆˆâˆ‚fâ¢(ğ’™,ğƒ)},Â ifÂ â¢fâ¢(ğ’™,ğƒ)=fâ¢(ğ’™â‹†,ğƒ).â„ğ’™ğƒcasesğ‘“ğ’™ğƒÂ ifÂ ğ‘“ğ’™ğƒğ‘“superscriptğ’™â‹†ğƒ0Â ifÂ ğ‘“ğ’™ğƒğ‘“superscriptğ’™â‹†ğƒconditional-setğ›¼ğ’ˆformulae-sequenceğ›¼01ğ’ˆğ‘“ğ’™ğƒÂ ifÂ ğ‘“ğ’™ğƒğ‘“superscriptğ’™â‹†ğƒ\partial h(\boldsymbol{x},\boldsymbol{\xi})=\begin{cases}\partial f(% \boldsymbol{x},\boldsymbol{\xi}),&\text{ if }f(\boldsymbol{x},\boldsymbol{\xi}% )>f(\boldsymbol{x}^{\star},\boldsymbol{\xi})\\ \{0\},&\text{ if }f(\boldsymbol{x},\boldsymbol{\xi})<f(\boldsymbol{x}^{\star},% \boldsymbol{\xi})\\ \{\alpha\boldsymbol{g}:\alpha\in[0,1],\boldsymbol{g}\in\partial f(\boldsymbol{% x},\boldsymbol{\xi})\},&\text{ if }f(\boldsymbol{x},\boldsymbol{\xi})=f(% \boldsymbol{x}^{\star},\boldsymbol{\xi})\end{cases}~{}.âˆ‚ italic_h ( bold_italic_x , bold_italic_Î¾ ) = { start_ROW start_CELL âˆ‚ italic_f ( bold_italic_x , bold_italic_Î¾ ) , end_CELL start_CELL if italic_f ( bold_italic_x , bold_italic_Î¾ ) > italic_f ( bold_italic_x start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT â‹† end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT , bold_italic_Î¾ ) end_CELL end_ROW start_ROW start_CELL { 0 } , end_CELL start_CELL if italic_f ( bold_italic_x , bold_italic_Î¾ ) < italic_f ( bold_italic_x start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT â‹† end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT , bold_italic_Î¾ ) end_CELL end_ROW start_ROW start_CELL { italic_Î± bold_italic_g : italic_Î± âˆˆ [ 0 , 1 ] , bold_italic_g âˆˆ âˆ‚ italic_f ( bold_italic_x , bold_italic_Î¾ ) } , end_CELL start_CELL if italic_f ( bold_italic_x , bold_italic_Î¾ ) = italic_f ( bold_italic_x start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT â‹† end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT , bold_italic_Î¾ ) end_CELL end_ROW .

Hence, for all ğ’ˆtâˆˆâˆ‚hâ¢(ğ’™t,ğƒt)subscriptğ’ˆğ‘¡â„subscriptğ’™ğ‘¡subscriptğƒğ‘¡\boldsymbol{g}_{t}\in\partial h(\boldsymbol{x}_{t},\boldsymbol{\xi}_{t})bold_italic_g start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT âˆˆ âˆ‚ italic_h ( bold_italic_x start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT , bold_italic_Î¾ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ) we have

â€–ğ’ˆtâ€–2superscriptnormsubscriptğ’ˆğ‘¡2\displaystyle\|\boldsymbol{g}_{t}\|^{2}âˆ¥ bold_italic_g start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT âˆ¥ start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT â‰¤2â¢Lâ¢(fâ¢(ğ’™,ğƒt)âˆ’infğ’™fâ¢(ğ’™,ğƒt))absent2ğ¿ğ‘“ğ’™subscriptğƒğ‘¡subscriptinfimumğ’™ğ‘“ğ’™subscriptğƒğ‘¡\displaystyle\leq 2L(f(\boldsymbol{x},\boldsymbol{\xi}_{t})-\inf_{\boldsymbol{% x}}\ f(\boldsymbol{x},\boldsymbol{\xi}_{t}))â‰¤ 2 italic_L ( italic_f ( bold_italic_x , bold_italic_Î¾ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ) - roman_inf start_POSTSUBSCRIPT bold_italic_x end_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_f ( bold_italic_x , bold_italic_Î¾ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ) )
=2â¢Lâ¢(fâ¢(ğ’™,ğƒt)âˆ’fâ¢(ğ’™â‹†,ğƒt)+fâ¢(ğ’™â‹†,ğƒt)âˆ’infğ’™fâ¢(ğ’™,ğƒt))absent2ğ¿ğ‘“ğ’™subscriptğƒğ‘¡ğ‘“superscriptğ’™â‹†subscriptğƒğ‘¡ğ‘“superscriptğ’™â‹†subscriptğƒğ‘¡subscriptinfimumğ’™ğ‘“ğ’™subscriptğƒğ‘¡\displaystyle=2L(f(\boldsymbol{x},\boldsymbol{\xi}_{t})-f(\boldsymbol{x}^{% \star},\boldsymbol{\xi}_{t})+f(\boldsymbol{x}^{\star},\boldsymbol{\xi}_{t})-% \inf_{\boldsymbol{x}}f(\boldsymbol{x},\boldsymbol{\xi}_{t}))= 2 italic_L ( italic_f ( bold_italic_x , bold_italic_Î¾ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ) - italic_f ( bold_italic_x start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT â‹† end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT , bold_italic_Î¾ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ) + italic_f ( bold_italic_x start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT â‹† end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT , bold_italic_Î¾ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ) - roman_inf start_POSTSUBSCRIPT bold_italic_x end_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_f ( bold_italic_x , bold_italic_Î¾ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ) )
â‰¤2â¢Lâ¢(hâ¢(ğ’™,ğƒt)+fâ¢(ğ’™â‹†,ğƒt)âˆ’infğ’™fâ¢(ğ’™,ğƒt)).absent2ğ¿â„ğ’™subscriptğƒğ‘¡ğ‘“superscriptğ’™â‹†subscriptğƒğ‘¡subscriptinfimumğ’™ğ‘“ğ’™subscriptğƒğ‘¡\displaystyle\leq 2L(h(\boldsymbol{x},\boldsymbol{\xi}_{t})+f(\boldsymbol{x}^{% \star},\boldsymbol{\xi}_{t})-\inf_{\boldsymbol{x}}f(\boldsymbol{x},\boldsymbol% {\xi}_{t}))~{}.â‰¤ 2 italic_L ( italic_h ( bold_italic_x , bold_italic_Î¾ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ) + italic_f ( bold_italic_x start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT â‹† end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT , bold_italic_Î¾ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ) - roman_inf start_POSTSUBSCRIPT bold_italic_x end_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_f ( bold_italic_x , bold_italic_Î¾ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ) ) .

So, using this inequality in LemmaÂ 3 gives

âˆ‘t=1Tht2â¢(ğ’™t)4â¢Lâ¢(htâ¢(ğ’™t)+ftâ¢(ğ’™â‹†)âˆ’ftâ‹†)â‰¤âˆ‘t=1Tht2â¢(ğ’™t)2â¢â€–ğ’ˆtâ€–2=âˆ‘t=1TÎ·tâ¢12â¢ht2â¢(ğ’™t)â‰¤12â¢â€–ğ’™1âˆ’ğ’™â‹†â€–2.superscriptsubscriptğ‘¡1ğ‘‡subscriptsuperscriptâ„2ğ‘¡subscriptğ’™ğ‘¡4ğ¿subscriptâ„ğ‘¡subscriptğ’™ğ‘¡subscriptğ‘“ğ‘¡superscriptğ’™â‹†superscriptsubscriptğ‘“ğ‘¡â‹†superscriptsubscriptğ‘¡1ğ‘‡subscriptsuperscriptâ„2ğ‘¡subscriptğ’™ğ‘¡2superscriptnormsubscriptğ’ˆğ‘¡2superscriptsubscriptğ‘¡1ğ‘‡subscriptğœ‚ğ‘¡12subscriptsuperscriptâ„2ğ‘¡subscriptğ’™ğ‘¡12superscriptnormsubscriptğ’™1superscriptğ’™â‹†2\sum_{t=1}^{T}\frac{h^{2}_{t}(\boldsymbol{x}_{t})}{4L(h_{t}(\boldsymbol{x}_{t}% )+f_{t}(\boldsymbol{x}^{\star})-f_{t}^{\star})}\leq\sum_{t=1}^{T}\frac{h^{2}_{% t}(\boldsymbol{x}_{t})}{2\|\boldsymbol{g}_{t}\|^{2}}=\sum_{t=1}^{T}\eta_{t}% \frac{1}{2}h^{2}_{t}(\boldsymbol{x}_{t})\leq\frac{1}{2}\|\boldsymbol{x}_{1}-% \boldsymbol{x}^{\star}\|^{2}~{}.âˆ‘ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t = 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_T end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT divide start_ARG italic_h start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ( bold_italic_x start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ) end_ARG start_ARG 4 italic_L ( italic_h start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ( bold_italic_x start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ) + italic_f start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ( bold_italic_x start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT â‹† end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ) - italic_f start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT â‹† end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ) end_ARG â‰¤ âˆ‘ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t = 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_T end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT divide start_ARG italic_h start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ( bold_italic_x start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ) end_ARG start_ARG 2 âˆ¥ bold_italic_g start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT âˆ¥ start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT end_ARG = âˆ‘ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t = 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_T end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_Î· start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT divide start_ARG 1 end_ARG start_ARG 2 end_ARG italic_h start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ( bold_italic_x start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ) â‰¤ divide start_ARG 1 end_ARG start_ARG 2 end_ARG âˆ¥ bold_italic_x start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT - bold_italic_x start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT â‹† end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT âˆ¥ start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT . (8)

Now, from Cauchyâ€“Schwarz inequality, for any non-negative random variable Yğ‘ŒYitalic_Y and random variable Xğ‘‹Xitalic_X, we have ğ”¼â¢[X2/Y]â‰¥(ğ”¼â¢[X])2/ğ”¼â¢[Y]ğ”¼delimited-[]superscriptğ‘‹2ğ‘Œsuperscriptğ”¼delimited-[]ğ‘‹2ğ”¼delimited-[]ğ‘Œ\mathbb{E}[X^{2}/Y]\geq(\mathbb{E}[X])^{2}/\mathbb{E}[Y]blackboard_E [ italic_X start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT / italic_Y ] â‰¥ ( blackboard_E [ italic_X ] ) start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT / blackboard_E [ italic_Y ]. Denote by ftâ‹†=infğ’™fâ¢(ğ’™,ğƒt)superscriptsubscriptğ‘“ğ‘¡â‹†subscriptinfimumğ’™ğ‘“ğ’™subscriptğƒğ‘¡f_{t}^{\star}=\inf_{\boldsymbol{x}}\ f(\boldsymbol{x},\boldsymbol{\xi}_{t})italic_f start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT â‹† end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT = roman_inf start_POSTSUBSCRIPT bold_italic_x end_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_f ( bold_italic_x , bold_italic_Î¾ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ). Given that ftâ¢(ğ’™â‹†)âˆ’ftâ‹†â‰¥0subscriptğ‘“ğ‘¡superscriptğ’™â‹†subscriptsuperscriptğ‘“â‹†ğ‘¡0f_{t}(\boldsymbol{x}^{\star})-f^{\star}_{t}\geq 0italic_f start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ( bold_italic_x start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT â‹† end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ) - italic_f start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT â‹† end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT â‰¥ 0, if ftâ¢(ğ’™â‹†)âˆ’ftâ‹†=0subscriptğ‘“ğ‘¡superscriptğ’™â‹†subscriptsuperscriptğ‘“â‹†ğ‘¡0f_{t}(\boldsymbol{x}^{\star})-f^{\star}_{t}=0italic_f start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ( bold_italic_x start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT â‹† end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ) - italic_f start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT â‹† end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT = 0 with probability 1, i.e., Fâ¢(ğ’™â‹†)âˆ’ğ”¼â¢[infğ’™fâ¢(ğ’™,ğƒ)]=0ğ¹superscriptğ’™â‹†ğ”¼delimited-[]subscriptinfimumğ’™ğ‘“ğ’™ğƒ0F(\boldsymbol{x}^{\star})-\mathbb{E}[\inf_{\boldsymbol{x}}f(\boldsymbol{x},% \boldsymbol{\xi})]=0italic_F ( bold_italic_x start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT â‹† end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ) - blackboard_E [ roman_inf start_POSTSUBSCRIPT bold_italic_x end_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_f ( bold_italic_x , bold_italic_Î¾ ) ] = 0, then the expectation of the l.h.s. of the previous inequality is ğ”¼â¢[htâ¢(ğ’™t)]ğ”¼delimited-[]subscriptâ„ğ‘¡subscriptğ’™ğ‘¡\mathbb{E}[h_{t}(\boldsymbol{x}_{t})]blackboard_E [ italic_h start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ( bold_italic_x start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ) ]. Otherwise, if we assume Fâ¢(ğ’™â‹†)âˆ’ğ”¼â¢[infğ’™fâ¢(ğ’™,ğƒ)]>0ğ¹superscriptğ’™â‹†ğ”¼delimited-[]subscriptinfimumğ’™ğ‘“ğ’™ğƒ0F(\boldsymbol{x}^{\star})-\mathbb{E}[\inf_{\boldsymbol{x}}f(\boldsymbol{x},% \boldsymbol{\xi})]>0italic_F ( bold_italic_x start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT â‹† end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ) - blackboard_E [ roman_inf start_POSTSUBSCRIPT bold_italic_x end_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_f ( bold_italic_x , bold_italic_Î¾ ) ] > 0, we have

ğ”¼â¢[ht2â¢(ğ’™t)4â¢Lâ¢(htâ¢(ğ’™t)+ftâ¢(ğ’™â‹†)âˆ’ftâ‹†)]â‰¥(ğ”¼â¢[htâ¢(ğ’™t)])24â¢Lâ¢(ğ”¼â¢[htâ¢(ğ’™t)]+Fâ¢(ğ’™â‹†)âˆ’ğ”¼â¢[infğ’™fâ¢(ğ’™,ğƒ)]).ğ”¼delimited-[]subscriptsuperscriptâ„2ğ‘¡subscriptğ’™ğ‘¡4ğ¿subscriptâ„ğ‘¡subscriptğ’™ğ‘¡subscriptğ‘“ğ‘¡superscriptğ’™â‹†superscriptsubscriptğ‘“ğ‘¡â‹†superscriptğ”¼delimited-[]subscriptâ„ğ‘¡subscriptğ’™ğ‘¡24ğ¿ğ”¼delimited-[]subscriptâ„ğ‘¡subscriptğ’™ğ‘¡ğ¹superscriptğ’™â‹†ğ”¼delimited-[]subscriptinfimumğ’™ğ‘“ğ’™ğƒ\mathbb{E}\left[\frac{h^{2}_{t}(\boldsymbol{x}_{t})}{4L(h_{t}(\boldsymbol{x}_{% t})+f_{t}(\boldsymbol{x}^{\star})-f_{t}^{\star})}\right]\geq\frac{(\mathbb{E}[% h_{t}(\boldsymbol{x}_{t})])^{2}}{4L(\mathbb{E}[h_{t}(\boldsymbol{x}_{t})]+F(% \boldsymbol{x}^{\star})-\mathbb{E}[\inf_{\boldsymbol{x}}f(\boldsymbol{x},% \boldsymbol{\xi})])}~{}.blackboard_E [ divide start_ARG italic_h start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ( bold_italic_x start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ) end_ARG start_ARG 4 italic_L ( italic_h start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ( bold_italic_x start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ) + italic_f start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ( bold_italic_x start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT â‹† end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ) - italic_f start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT â‹† end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ) end_ARG ] â‰¥ divide start_ARG ( blackboard_E [ italic_h start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ( bold_italic_x start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ) ] ) start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT end_ARG start_ARG 4 italic_L ( blackboard_E [ italic_h start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ( bold_italic_x start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ) ] + italic_F ( bold_italic_x start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT â‹† end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ) - blackboard_E [ roman_inf start_POSTSUBSCRIPT bold_italic_x end_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_f ( bold_italic_x , bold_italic_Î¾ ) ] ) end_ARG .

Hence, in all cases we have the last expression is a lower bound to the l.h.s. of (8). We now can proceed as in the proof of the Lipschitz case in TheoremÂ 3, to have the stated bound. âˆ

We now extend TheoremÂ 3 to HÃ¶lder-self-bounded functions.

Definition 6.

We say that fğ‘“fitalic_f is (LÎ½,Î½)subscriptğ¿ğœˆğœˆ(L_{\nu},\nu)( italic_L start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_Î½ end_POSTSUBSCRIPT , italic_Î½ ) HÃ¶lder-self-bounded if there exits Î½âˆˆ[0,1]ğœˆ01\nu\in[0,1]italic_Î½ âˆˆ [ 0 , 1 ] and LÎ½subscriptğ¿ğœˆL_{\nu}italic_L start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_Î½ end_POSTSUBSCRIPT such That

â€–ğ’ˆâ€–2â‰¤(1+1Î½)2â¢Î½1+Î½â¢LÎ½21+Î½â¢(fâ¢(ğ’™)âˆ’fâ¢(ğ’™â‹†))2â¢Î½1+Î½,âˆ€ğ’ˆâˆˆâˆ‚fâ¢(ğ’™).formulae-sequencesuperscriptnormğ’ˆ2superscript11ğœˆ2ğœˆ1ğœˆsubscriptsuperscriptğ¿21ğœˆğœˆsuperscriptğ‘“ğ’™ğ‘“superscriptğ’™â‹†2ğœˆ1ğœˆfor-allğ’ˆğ‘“ğ’™\|\boldsymbol{g}\|^{2}\leq\left(1+\frac{1}{\nu}\right)^{\frac{2\nu}{1+\nu}}L^{% \frac{2}{1+\nu}}_{\nu}(f(\boldsymbol{x})-f(\boldsymbol{x}^{\star}))^{\frac{2% \nu}{1+\nu}},\ \forall\boldsymbol{g}\in\partial f(\boldsymbol{x})~{}.âˆ¥ bold_italic_g âˆ¥ start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT â‰¤ ( 1 + divide start_ARG 1 end_ARG start_ARG italic_Î½ end_ARG ) start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT divide start_ARG 2 italic_Î½ end_ARG start_ARG 1 + italic_Î½ end_ARG end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_L start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT divide start_ARG 2 end_ARG start_ARG 1 + italic_Î½ end_ARG end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_Î½ end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ( italic_f ( bold_italic_x ) - italic_f ( bold_italic_x start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT â‹† end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ) ) start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT divide start_ARG 2 italic_Î½ end_ARG start_ARG 1 + italic_Î½ end_ARG end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT , âˆ€ bold_italic_g âˆˆ âˆ‚ italic_f ( bold_italic_x ) .

This definition is weaker than both Lipschitz and smoothness and it is easy to see that Lğ¿Litalic_L-smooth functions satisfies this condition with Î½=1ğœˆ1\nu=1italic_Î½ = 1 and L1=Lsubscriptğ¿1ğ¿L_{1}=Litalic_L start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT = italic_L.

The following theorem generalizes both the Lipschitz and the smooth case, recovering both bounds up to constant factors.

Theorem 7.

Let h:â„dÃ—ğ’®â†’â„â‰¥0:â„â†’superscriptâ„ğ‘‘ğ’®subscriptâ„absent0h:\mathbb{R}^{d}\times\mathcal{S}\to\mathbb{R}_{\geq 0}italic_h : blackboard_R start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_d end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT Ã— caligraphic_S â†’ blackboard_R start_POSTSUBSCRIPT â‰¥ 0 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT be convex. Denote by Hâ¢(ğ±)=ğ”¼ğ›âˆ¼Dâ¢[hâ¢(ğ±,ğ›)]ğ»ğ±subscriptğ”¼similar-toğ›ğ·delimited-[]â„ğ±ğ›H(\boldsymbol{x})=\mathbb{E}_{\boldsymbol{\xi}\sim D}[h(\boldsymbol{x},% \boldsymbol{\xi})]italic_H ( bold_italic_x ) = blackboard_E start_POSTSUBSCRIPT bold_italic_Î¾ âˆ¼ italic_D end_POSTSUBSCRIPT [ italic_h ( bold_italic_x , bold_italic_Î¾ ) ]. Assume that hâ¢(â‹…,ğ›t)â„â‹…subscriptğ›ğ‘¡h(\cdot,\boldsymbol{\xi}_{t})italic_h ( â‹… , bold_italic_Î¾ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ) is (LÎ½,Î½)subscriptğ¿ğœˆğœˆ(L_{\nu},\nu)( italic_L start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_Î½ end_POSTSUBSCRIPT , italic_Î½ )-HÃ¶lder-self bounded. Then, setting Î·t=minâ¡(1â€–ğ tâ€–2,Î³hâ¢(ğ±t,ğ›t))subscriptğœ‚ğ‘¡1superscriptnormsubscriptğ ğ‘¡2ğ›¾â„subscriptğ±ğ‘¡subscriptğ›ğ‘¡\eta_{t}=\min\left(\frac{1}{\|\boldsymbol{g}_{t}\|^{2}},\frac{\gamma}{h(% \boldsymbol{x}_{t},\boldsymbol{\xi}_{t})}\right)italic_Î· start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT = roman_min ( divide start_ARG 1 end_ARG start_ARG âˆ¥ bold_italic_g start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT âˆ¥ start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT end_ARG , divide start_ARG italic_Î³ end_ARG start_ARG italic_h ( bold_italic_x start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT , bold_italic_Î¾ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ) end_ARG ) in AlgorithmÂ 1, we have

1Tâ¢âˆ‘t=1Tğ”¼â¢[Hâ¢(ğ’™t)]â‰¤Qâ¢(â€–ğ’™1âˆ’ğ’™â‹†â€–2Tâ¢Î³+2â¢Hâ¢(ğ’™â‹†)),1ğ‘‡superscriptsubscriptğ‘¡1ğ‘‡ğ”¼delimited-[]ğ»subscriptğ’™ğ‘¡ğ‘„superscriptnormsubscriptğ’™1superscriptğ’™â‹†2ğ‘‡ğ›¾2ğ»superscriptğ’™â‹†\frac{1}{T}\sum_{t=1}^{T}\mathbb{E}[H(\boldsymbol{x}_{t})]\leq Q\left(\frac{\|% \boldsymbol{x}_{1}-\boldsymbol{x}^{\star}\|^{2}}{T\gamma}+2H(\boldsymbol{x}^{% \star})\right),divide start_ARG 1 end_ARG start_ARG italic_T end_ARG âˆ‘ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t = 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_T end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT blackboard_E [ italic_H ( bold_italic_x start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ) ] â‰¤ italic_Q ( divide start_ARG âˆ¥ bold_italic_x start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT - bold_italic_x start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT â‹† end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT âˆ¥ start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT end_ARG start_ARG italic_T italic_Î³ end_ARG + 2 italic_H ( bold_italic_x start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT â‹† end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ) ) ,

where Qâ¢(y)=2â¢y+LÎ½â¢(2â¢Î³â¢y)1+Î½2â¢(1+1Î½)Î½ğ‘„ğ‘¦2ğ‘¦subscriptğ¿ğœˆsuperscript2ğ›¾ğ‘¦1ğœˆ2superscript11ğœˆğœˆQ(y)=2y+L_{\nu}(2\gamma y)^{\frac{1+\nu}{2}}\left(1+\frac{1}{\nu}\right)^{\nu}italic_Q ( italic_y ) = 2 italic_y + italic_L start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_Î½ end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ( 2 italic_Î³ italic_y ) start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT divide start_ARG 1 + italic_Î½ end_ARG start_ARG 2 end_ARG end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ( 1 + divide start_ARG 1 end_ARG start_ARG italic_Î½ end_ARG ) start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_Î½ end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT.

Proof.

For simplicity, denote by htâ¢(ğ’™)=hâ¢(ğ’™,Î¾t)subscriptâ„ğ‘¡ğ’™â„ğ’™subscriptğœ‰ğ‘¡h_{t}(\boldsymbol{x})=h(\boldsymbol{x},\xi_{t})italic_h start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ( bold_italic_x ) = italic_h ( bold_italic_x , italic_Î¾ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ).

From the LemmaÂ 3, we have

âˆ‘t=1TÎ·tâ¢12â¢ht2â¢(ğ’™t)â‰¤12â¢â€–ğ’™1âˆ’ğ’™â‹†â€–2+âˆ‘t=1TÎ·t2â¢(Î·tâˆ’1â€–ğ’ˆtâ€–2)â¢â€–ğ’ˆtâ€–2â¢ht2â¢(ğ’™t)+âˆ‘t=1TÎ·tâ¢htâ¢(ğ’™t)â¢htâ¢(ğ’™â‹†).superscriptsubscriptğ‘¡1ğ‘‡subscriptğœ‚ğ‘¡12subscriptsuperscriptâ„2ğ‘¡subscriptğ’™ğ‘¡12superscriptnormsubscriptğ’™1superscriptğ’™â‹†2superscriptsubscriptğ‘¡1ğ‘‡subscriptğœ‚ğ‘¡2subscriptğœ‚ğ‘¡1superscriptnormsubscriptğ’ˆğ‘¡2superscriptnormsubscriptğ’ˆğ‘¡2subscriptsuperscriptâ„2ğ‘¡subscriptğ’™ğ‘¡superscriptsubscriptğ‘¡1ğ‘‡subscriptğœ‚ğ‘¡subscriptâ„ğ‘¡subscriptğ’™ğ‘¡subscriptâ„ğ‘¡superscriptğ’™â‹†\sum_{t=1}^{T}\eta_{t}\frac{1}{2}h^{2}_{t}(\boldsymbol{x}_{t})\leq\frac{1}{2}% \|\boldsymbol{x}_{1}-\boldsymbol{x}^{\star}\|^{2}+\sum_{t=1}^{T}\frac{\eta_{t}% }{2}\left(\eta_{t}-\frac{1}{\|\boldsymbol{g}_{t}\|^{2}}\right)\|\boldsymbol{g}% _{t}\|^{2}h^{2}_{t}(\boldsymbol{x}_{t})+\sum_{t=1}^{T}\eta_{t}h_{t}(% \boldsymbol{x}_{t})h_{t}(\boldsymbol{x}^{\star})~{}.âˆ‘ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t = 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_T end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_Î· start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT divide start_ARG 1 end_ARG start_ARG 2 end_ARG italic_h start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ( bold_italic_x start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ) â‰¤ divide start_ARG 1 end_ARG start_ARG 2 end_ARG âˆ¥ bold_italic_x start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT - bold_italic_x start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT â‹† end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT âˆ¥ start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT + âˆ‘ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t = 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_T end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT divide start_ARG italic_Î· start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT end_ARG start_ARG 2 end_ARG ( italic_Î· start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT - divide start_ARG 1 end_ARG start_ARG âˆ¥ bold_italic_g start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT âˆ¥ start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT end_ARG ) âˆ¥ bold_italic_g start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT âˆ¥ start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_h start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ( bold_italic_x start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ) + âˆ‘ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t = 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_T end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_Î· start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_h start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ( bold_italic_x start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ) italic_h start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ( bold_italic_x start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT â‹† end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ) .

For the last term in the r.h.s., we have

Î·tâ¢htâ¢(ğ’™t)â¢htâ¢(ğ’™â‹†)=minâ¡(1â€–ğ’ˆtâ€–2,Î³htâ¢(ğ’™t))â¢htâ¢(ğ’™t)â¢htâ¢(ğ’™â‹†)â‰¤Î³â¢htâ¢(ğ’™â‹†).subscriptğœ‚ğ‘¡subscriptâ„ğ‘¡subscriptğ’™ğ‘¡subscriptâ„ğ‘¡superscriptğ’™â‹†1superscriptnormsubscriptğ’ˆğ‘¡2ğ›¾subscriptâ„ğ‘¡subscriptğ’™ğ‘¡subscriptâ„ğ‘¡subscriptğ’™ğ‘¡subscriptâ„ğ‘¡superscriptğ’™â‹†ğ›¾subscriptâ„ğ‘¡superscriptğ’™â‹†\eta_{t}h_{t}(\boldsymbol{x}_{t})h_{t}(\boldsymbol{x}^{\star})=\min\left(\frac% {1}{\|\boldsymbol{g}_{t}\|^{2}},\frac{\gamma}{h_{t}(\boldsymbol{x}_{t})}\right% )h_{t}(\boldsymbol{x}_{t})h_{t}(\boldsymbol{x}^{\star})\leq\gamma h_{t}(% \boldsymbol{x}^{\star})~{}.italic_Î· start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_h start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ( bold_italic_x start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ) italic_h start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ( bold_italic_x start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT â‹† end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ) = roman_min ( divide start_ARG 1 end_ARG start_ARG âˆ¥ bold_italic_g start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT âˆ¥ start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT end_ARG , divide start_ARG italic_Î³ end_ARG start_ARG italic_h start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ( bold_italic_x start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ) end_ARG ) italic_h start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ( bold_italic_x start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ) italic_h start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ( bold_italic_x start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT â‹† end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ) â‰¤ italic_Î³ italic_h start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ( bold_italic_x start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT â‹† end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ) .

Observe that if htsubscriptâ„ğ‘¡h_{t}italic_h start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT is (LÎ½,Î½)subscriptğ¿ğœˆğœˆ(L_{\nu},\nu)( italic_L start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_Î½ end_POSTSUBSCRIPT , italic_Î½ )-HÃ¶lder-self-bounded then

â€–gtâ€–2â‰¤(1+1Î½)2â¢Î½1+Î½â¢LÎ½21+Î½â¢(htâ¢(ğ’™)âˆ’infğ’™htâ¢(ğ’™))2â¢Î½1+Î½â‰¤KÎ½â¢htâ¢(ğ’™)2â¢Î½1+Î½,superscriptnormsubscriptğ‘”ğ‘¡2superscript11ğœˆ2ğœˆ1ğœˆsubscriptsuperscriptğ¿21ğœˆğœˆsuperscriptsubscriptâ„ğ‘¡ğ’™subscriptinfimumğ’™subscriptâ„ğ‘¡ğ’™2ğœˆ1ğœˆsubscriptğ¾ğœˆsubscriptâ„ğ‘¡superscriptğ’™2ğœˆ1ğœˆ\displaystyle\|g_{t}\|^{2}\leq\left(1+\frac{1}{\nu}\right)^{\frac{2\nu}{1+\nu}% }L^{\frac{2}{1+\nu}}_{\nu}(h_{t}(\boldsymbol{x})-\inf_{\boldsymbol{x}}h_{t}(% \boldsymbol{x}))^{\frac{2\nu}{1+\nu}}\leq K_{\nu}h_{t}(\boldsymbol{x})^{\frac{% 2\nu}{1+\nu}},âˆ¥ italic_g start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT âˆ¥ start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT â‰¤ ( 1 + divide start_ARG 1 end_ARG start_ARG italic_Î½ end_ARG ) start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT divide start_ARG 2 italic_Î½ end_ARG start_ARG 1 + italic_Î½ end_ARG end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_L start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT divide start_ARG 2 end_ARG start_ARG 1 + italic_Î½ end_ARG end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_Î½ end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ( italic_h start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ( bold_italic_x ) - roman_inf start_POSTSUBSCRIPT bold_italic_x end_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_h start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ( bold_italic_x ) ) start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT divide start_ARG 2 italic_Î½ end_ARG start_ARG 1 + italic_Î½ end_ARG end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT â‰¤ italic_K start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_Î½ end_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_h start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ( bold_italic_x ) start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT divide start_ARG 2 italic_Î½ end_ARG start_ARG 1 + italic_Î½ end_ARG end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ,

where KÎ½=(1+1Î½)2â¢Î½1+Î½â¢LÎ½21+Î½subscriptğ¾ğœˆsuperscript11ğœˆ2ğœˆ1ğœˆsubscriptsuperscriptğ¿21ğœˆğœˆK_{\nu}=\left(1+\frac{1}{\nu}\right)^{\frac{2\nu}{1+\nu}}L^{\frac{2}{1+\nu}}_{\nu}italic_K start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_Î½ end_POSTSUBSCRIPT = ( 1 + divide start_ARG 1 end_ARG start_ARG italic_Î½ end_ARG ) start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT divide start_ARG 2 italic_Î½ end_ARG start_ARG 1 + italic_Î½ end_ARG end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_L start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT divide start_ARG 2 end_ARG start_ARG 1 + italic_Î½ end_ARG end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_Î½ end_POSTSUBSCRIPT. Therefore, we have

minâ¡(ht1âˆ’Î½1+Î½â¢(ğ’™t)KÎ½,Î³)â¢htâ¢(ğ’™t)â‰¤minâ¡(htâ¢(ğ’™t)â€–ğ’ˆtâ€–2,Î³)â¢htâ¢(ğ’™t)=Î·tâ¢ht2â¢(ğ’™t).subscriptsuperscriptâ„1ğœˆ1ğœˆğ‘¡subscriptğ’™ğ‘¡subscriptğ¾ğœˆğ›¾subscriptâ„ğ‘¡subscriptğ’™ğ‘¡subscriptâ„ğ‘¡subscriptğ’™ğ‘¡superscriptnormsubscriptğ’ˆğ‘¡2ğ›¾subscriptâ„ğ‘¡subscriptğ’™ğ‘¡subscriptğœ‚ğ‘¡subscriptsuperscriptâ„2ğ‘¡subscriptğ’™ğ‘¡\min\left(\frac{h^{\frac{1-\nu}{1+\nu}}_{t}(\boldsymbol{x}_{t})}{K_{\nu}},% \gamma\right)h_{t}(\boldsymbol{x}_{t})\leq\min\left(\frac{h_{t}(\boldsymbol{x}% _{t})}{\|\boldsymbol{g}_{t}\|^{2}},\gamma\right)h_{t}(\boldsymbol{x}_{t})=\eta% _{t}h^{2}_{t}(\boldsymbol{x}_{t})~{}.roman_min ( divide start_ARG italic_h start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT divide start_ARG 1 - italic_Î½ end_ARG start_ARG 1 + italic_Î½ end_ARG end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ( bold_italic_x start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ) end_ARG start_ARG italic_K start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_Î½ end_POSTSUBSCRIPT end_ARG , italic_Î³ ) italic_h start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ( bold_italic_x start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ) â‰¤ roman_min ( divide start_ARG italic_h start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ( bold_italic_x start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ) end_ARG start_ARG âˆ¥ bold_italic_g start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT âˆ¥ start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT end_ARG , italic_Î³ ) italic_h start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ( bold_italic_x start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ) = italic_Î· start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_h start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ( bold_italic_x start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ) .

As before, we lower bound the minimum with the convex function Bâ¢(x)=x21+Î½x1âˆ’Î½1+Î½+Î³â¢KÎ½ğµğ‘¥superscriptğ‘¥21ğœˆsuperscriptğ‘¥1ğœˆ1ğœˆğ›¾subscriptğ¾ğœˆB(x)=\frac{x^{\frac{2}{1+\nu}}}{x^{\frac{1-\nu}{1+\nu}}+\gamma K_{\nu}}italic_B ( italic_x ) = divide start_ARG italic_x start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT divide start_ARG 2 end_ARG start_ARG 1 + italic_Î½ end_ARG end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT end_ARG start_ARG italic_x start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT divide start_ARG 1 - italic_Î½ end_ARG start_ARG 1 + italic_Î½ end_ARG end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT + italic_Î³ italic_K start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_Î½ end_POSTSUBSCRIPT end_ARG:

minâ¡(ht1âˆ’Î½1+Î½â¢(ğ’™t)KÎ½,Î³)â¢htâ¢(ğ’™t)â‰¥Î³â¢ht21+Î½â¢(ğ’™t)ht1âˆ’Î½1+Î½â¢(ğ’™t)+Î³â¢KÎ½=Î³â¢Bâ¢(htâ¢(ğ’™t)).subscriptsuperscriptâ„1ğœˆ1ğœˆğ‘¡subscriptğ’™ğ‘¡subscriptğ¾ğœˆğ›¾subscriptâ„ğ‘¡subscriptğ’™ğ‘¡ğ›¾subscriptsuperscriptâ„21ğœˆğ‘¡subscriptğ’™ğ‘¡subscriptsuperscriptâ„1ğœˆ1ğœˆğ‘¡subscriptğ’™ğ‘¡ğ›¾subscriptğ¾ğœˆğ›¾ğµsubscriptâ„ğ‘¡subscriptğ’™ğ‘¡\min\left(\frac{h^{\frac{1-\nu}{1+\nu}}_{t}(\boldsymbol{x}_{t})}{K_{\nu}},% \gamma\right)h_{t}(\boldsymbol{x}_{t})\geq\frac{\gamma h^{\frac{2}{1+\nu}}_{t}% (\boldsymbol{x}_{t})}{h^{\frac{1-\nu}{1+\nu}}_{t}(\boldsymbol{x}_{t})+\gamma K% _{\nu}}=\gamma B(h_{t}(\boldsymbol{x}_{t}))~{}.roman_min ( divide start_ARG italic_h start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT divide start_ARG 1 - italic_Î½ end_ARG start_ARG 1 + italic_Î½ end_ARG end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ( bold_italic_x start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ) end_ARG start_ARG italic_K start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_Î½ end_POSTSUBSCRIPT end_ARG , italic_Î³ ) italic_h start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ( bold_italic_x start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ) â‰¥ divide start_ARG italic_Î³ italic_h start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT divide start_ARG 2 end_ARG start_ARG 1 + italic_Î½ end_ARG end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ( bold_italic_x start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ) end_ARG start_ARG italic_h start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT divide start_ARG 1 - italic_Î½ end_ARG start_ARG 1 + italic_Î½ end_ARG end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ( bold_italic_x start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ) + italic_Î³ italic_K start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_Î½ end_POSTSUBSCRIPT end_ARG = italic_Î³ italic_B ( italic_h start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ( bold_italic_x start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ) ) .

As before, this allows us to use Jensenâ€™s inequality:

Bâ¢(1Tâ¢âˆ‘t=1Thtâ¢(ğ’™t))ğµ1ğ‘‡superscriptsubscriptğ‘¡1ğ‘‡subscriptâ„ğ‘¡subscriptğ’™ğ‘¡\displaystyle B\left(\frac{1}{T}\sum_{t=1}^{T}h_{t}(\boldsymbol{x}_{t})\right)italic_B ( divide start_ARG 1 end_ARG start_ARG italic_T end_ARG âˆ‘ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t = 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_T end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_h start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ( bold_italic_x start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ) ) â‰¤1Tâ¢âˆ‘t=1TBâ¢(htâ¢(ğ’™t))â‰¤â€–ğ’™1âˆ’ğ’™â‹†â€–2Î³â¢T+2Tâ¢âˆ‘t=1Thtâ¢(ğ’™â‹†).absent1ğ‘‡superscriptsubscriptğ‘¡1ğ‘‡ğµsubscriptâ„ğ‘¡subscriptğ’™ğ‘¡superscriptnormsubscriptğ’™1superscriptğ’™â‹†2ğ›¾ğ‘‡2ğ‘‡superscriptsubscriptğ‘¡1ğ‘‡subscriptâ„ğ‘¡superscriptğ’™â‹†\displaystyle\leq\frac{1}{T}\sum_{t=1}^{T}B(h_{t}(\boldsymbol{x}_{t}))\leq% \frac{\|\boldsymbol{x}_{1}-\boldsymbol{x}^{\star}\|^{2}}{\gamma T}+\frac{2}{T}% \sum_{t=1}^{T}h_{t}(\boldsymbol{x}^{\star})~{}.â‰¤ divide start_ARG 1 end_ARG start_ARG italic_T end_ARG âˆ‘ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t = 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_T end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_B ( italic_h start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ( bold_italic_x start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ) ) â‰¤ divide start_ARG âˆ¥ bold_italic_x start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT - bold_italic_x start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT â‹† end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT âˆ¥ start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT end_ARG start_ARG italic_Î³ italic_T end_ARG + divide start_ARG 2 end_ARG start_ARG italic_T end_ARG âˆ‘ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t = 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_T end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_h start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ( bold_italic_x start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT â‹† end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ) .

For simplicity of calculations, we now lower bound Bâ¢(x)ğµğ‘¥B(x)italic_B ( italic_x ),

Câ¢(x)â‰”0.5â¢minâ¡(x,x21+Î½Î³â¢KÎ½)=x21+Î½2â¢maxâ¡{x1âˆ’Î½1+Î½,Î³â¢KÎ½}â‰¤Bâ¢(x).â‰”ğ¶ğ‘¥0.5ğ‘¥superscriptğ‘¥21ğœˆğ›¾subscriptğ¾ğœˆsuperscriptğ‘¥21ğœˆ2superscriptğ‘¥1ğœˆ1ğœˆğ›¾subscriptğ¾ğœˆğµğ‘¥\displaystyle C(x)\coloneqq 0.5\min\left(x,\frac{x^{\frac{2}{1+\nu}}}{\gamma K% _{\nu}}\right)=\frac{x^{\frac{2}{1+\nu}}}{2\max\{x^{\frac{1-\nu}{1+\nu}},% \gamma K_{\nu}\}}\leq B(x).italic_C ( italic_x ) â‰” 0.5 roman_min ( italic_x , divide start_ARG italic_x start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT divide start_ARG 2 end_ARG start_ARG 1 + italic_Î½ end_ARG end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT end_ARG start_ARG italic_Î³ italic_K start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_Î½ end_POSTSUBSCRIPT end_ARG ) = divide start_ARG italic_x start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT divide start_ARG 2 end_ARG start_ARG 1 + italic_Î½ end_ARG end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT end_ARG start_ARG 2 roman_max { italic_x start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT divide start_ARG 1 - italic_Î½ end_ARG start_ARG 1 + italic_Î½ end_ARG end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT , italic_Î³ italic_K start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_Î½ end_POSTSUBSCRIPT } end_ARG â‰¤ italic_B ( italic_x ) .

Note that Câ¢(x)ğ¶ğ‘¥C(x)italic_C ( italic_x ) is invertible and its inverse is

â‰¤2â¢y+(2â¢Î³â¢KÎ½â¢y)1+Î½2absent2ğ‘¦superscript2ğ›¾subscriptğ¾ğœˆğ‘¦1ğœˆ2\displaystyle\leq 2y+(2\gamma K_{\nu}y)^{\frac{1+\nu}{2}}â‰¤ 2 italic_y + ( 2 italic_Î³ italic_K start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_Î½ end_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_y ) start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT divide start_ARG 1 + italic_Î½ end_ARG start_ARG 2 end_ARG end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT

Taking expectations and using Jensenâ€™s inequality gives the stated bound. âˆ

Appendix E Proofs for SectionÂ 6

Lemma 4.

Let f:â„nâ†’â„+:ğ‘“â†’superscriptâ„ğ‘›superscriptâ„f:\mathbb{R}^{n}\to\mathbb{R}^{+}italic_f : blackboard_R start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_n end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT â†’ blackboard_R start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT + end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT where fâ‹†=infğ±fâ¢(ğ±)superscriptğ‘“â‹†subscriptinfimumğ±ğ‘“ğ±f^{\star}=\inf_{\boldsymbol{x}}f(\boldsymbol{x})italic_f start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT â‹† end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT = roman_inf start_POSTSUBSCRIPT bold_italic_x end_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_f ( bold_italic_x ). Then for any câ‰¥0ğ‘0c\geq 0italic_c â‰¥ 0 the following are equivalent:

  • â€¢

    fâ¢(ğ’™)âˆ’fâ‹†<câ¢fâ‹†ğ‘“ğ’™superscriptğ‘“â‹†ğ‘superscriptğ‘“â‹†f(\boldsymbol{x})-f^{\star}<cf^{\star}italic_f ( bold_italic_x ) - italic_f start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT â‹† end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT < italic_c italic_f start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT â‹† end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT,

  • â€¢

    fâ¢(ğ’™)âˆ’fâ‹†<cc+1â¢fâ¢(ğ’™)ğ‘“ğ’™superscriptğ‘“â‹†ğ‘ğ‘1ğ‘“ğ’™f(\boldsymbol{x})-f^{\star}<\frac{c}{c+1}f(\boldsymbol{x})italic_f ( bold_italic_x ) - italic_f start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT â‹† end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT < divide start_ARG italic_c end_ARG start_ARG italic_c + 1 end_ARG italic_f ( bold_italic_x ).

Proof.
fâ¢(ğ’™)âˆ’fâ‹†<câ¢fâ‹†ğ‘“ğ’™superscriptğ‘“â‹†ğ‘superscriptğ‘“â‹†\displaystyle f(\boldsymbol{x})-f^{\star}<cf^{\star}italic_f ( bold_italic_x ) - italic_f start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT â‹† end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT < italic_c italic_f start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT â‹† end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT â‡”fâ¢(ğ’™)<(c+1)â¢fâ‹†â‡”absentğ‘“ğ’™ğ‘1superscriptğ‘“â‹†\displaystyle\Leftrightarrow f(\boldsymbol{x})<(c+1)f^{\star}â‡” italic_f ( bold_italic_x ) < ( italic_c + 1 ) italic_f start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT â‹† end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT
â‡”fâ¢(ğ’™)(c+1)<fâ‹†â‡”absentğ‘“ğ’™ğ‘1superscriptğ‘“â‹†\displaystyle\Leftrightarrow\frac{f(\boldsymbol{x})}{(c+1)}<f^{\star}â‡” divide start_ARG italic_f ( bold_italic_x ) end_ARG start_ARG ( italic_c + 1 ) end_ARG < italic_f start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT â‹† end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT
â‡”fâ¢(ğ’™)âˆ’fâ‹†<(1âˆ’1c+1)â¢fâ¢(ğ’™)=cc+1â¢fâ¢(ğ’™).âˆâ‡”absentğ‘“ğ’™superscriptğ‘“â‹†11ğ‘1ğ‘“ğ’™ğ‘ğ‘1ğ‘“ğ’™\displaystyle\Leftrightarrow f(\boldsymbol{x})-f^{\star}<\left(1-\frac{1}{c+1}% \right)f(\boldsymbol{x})=\frac{c}{c+1}f(\boldsymbol{x})~{}.\qedâ‡” italic_f ( bold_italic_x ) - italic_f start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT â‹† end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT < ( 1 - divide start_ARG 1 end_ARG start_ARG italic_c + 1 end_ARG ) italic_f ( bold_italic_x ) = divide start_ARG italic_c end_ARG start_ARG italic_c + 1 end_ARG italic_f ( bold_italic_x ) . italic_âˆ
Proposition 1.

Suppose hâ„hitalic_h is convex, strictly positive, Lğ¿Litalic_L-self-bounded, and satisfies the quadratic growth condition hâ¢(ğ±)âˆ’hâ‹†â‰¥Î¼2â¢â€–ğ±âˆ’ğ±â‹†â€–2â„ğ±superscriptâ„â‹†ğœ‡2superscriptnormğ±superscriptğ±â‹†2h(\boldsymbol{x})-h^{\star}\geq\frac{\mu}{2}\|\boldsymbol{x}-\boldsymbol{x}^{% \star}\|^{2}italic_h ( bold_italic_x ) - italic_h start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT â‹† end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT â‰¥ divide start_ARG italic_Î¼ end_ARG start_ARG 2 end_ARG âˆ¥ bold_italic_x - bold_italic_x start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT â‹† end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT âˆ¥ start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT, where ğ±â‹†=argâ¡minğ±â¡hâ¢(ğ±)superscriptğ±â‹†subscriptğ±â„ğ±\boldsymbol{x}^{\star}=\arg\min_{\boldsymbol{x}}h(\boldsymbol{x})bold_italic_x start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT â‹† end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT = roman_arg roman_min start_POSTSUBSCRIPT bold_italic_x end_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_h ( bold_italic_x ) is the only fixed point of TÂ (6). Then for any point ğ±âˆˆS={ğ²:hâ¢(ğ²)âˆ’hâ‹†<hâ‹†â¢Î¼8â¢Lâˆ’Î¼}ğ±ğ‘†conditional-setğ²â„ğ²superscriptâ„â‹†superscriptâ„â‹†ğœ‡8ğ¿ğœ‡\boldsymbol{x}\in S=\{\boldsymbol{y}:h(\boldsymbol{y})-h^{\star}<h^{\star}% \frac{\mu}{8L-\mu}\}bold_italic_x âˆˆ italic_S = { bold_italic_y : italic_h ( bold_italic_y ) - italic_h start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT â‹† end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT < italic_h start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT â‹† end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT divide start_ARG italic_Î¼ end_ARG start_ARG 8 italic_L - italic_Î¼ end_ARG } we have

â€–Tâ¢(ğ’™)âˆ’ğ’™â‹†â€–>â€–ğ’™âˆ’ğ’™â‹†â€–.normğ‘‡ğ’™superscriptğ’™â‹†normğ’™superscriptğ’™â‹†\|T(\boldsymbol{x})-\boldsymbol{x}^{\star}\|>\|\boldsymbol{x}-\boldsymbol{x}^{% \star}\|~{}.âˆ¥ italic_T ( bold_italic_x ) - bold_italic_x start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT â‹† end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT âˆ¥ > âˆ¥ bold_italic_x - bold_italic_x start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT â‹† end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT âˆ¥ .
Proof.

Let ğ’™tsubscriptğ’™ğ‘¡\boldsymbol{x}_{t}bold_italic_x start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT be in Sğ‘†Sitalic_S then by definition of Tğ‘‡Titalic_T we have

12â¢â€–ğ’™t+1âˆ’ğ’™â‹†â€–212superscriptnormsubscriptğ’™ğ‘¡1superscriptğ’™â‹†2\displaystyle\frac{1}{2}\|\boldsymbol{x}_{t+1}-\boldsymbol{x}^{\star}\|^{2}divide start_ARG 1 end_ARG start_ARG 2 end_ARG âˆ¥ bold_italic_x start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t + 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT - bold_italic_x start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT â‹† end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT âˆ¥ start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT =12â¢â€–ğ’™tâˆ’ğ’™â‹†â€–2âˆ’Î·tâ¢âŸ¨ğ’ˆt,ğ’™tâˆ’ğ’™â‹†âŸ©+Î·t22â¢â€–ğ’ˆtâ€–2absent12superscriptnormsubscriptğ’™ğ‘¡superscriptğ’™â‹†2subscriptğœ‚ğ‘¡subscriptğ’ˆğ‘¡subscriptğ’™ğ‘¡superscriptğ’™â‹†superscriptsubscriptğœ‚ğ‘¡22superscriptnormsubscriptğ’ˆğ‘¡2\displaystyle=\frac{1}{2}\|\boldsymbol{x}_{t}-\boldsymbol{x}^{\star}\|^{2}-% \eta_{t}\langle\boldsymbol{g}_{t},\boldsymbol{x}_{t}-\boldsymbol{x}^{\star}% \rangle+\frac{\eta_{t}^{2}}{2}\|\boldsymbol{g}_{t}\|^{2}= divide start_ARG 1 end_ARG start_ARG 2 end_ARG âˆ¥ bold_italic_x start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT - bold_italic_x start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT â‹† end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT âˆ¥ start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT - italic_Î· start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT âŸ¨ bold_italic_g start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT , bold_italic_x start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT - bold_italic_x start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT â‹† end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT âŸ© + divide start_ARG italic_Î· start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT end_ARG start_ARG 2 end_ARG âˆ¥ bold_italic_g start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT âˆ¥ start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT
â‰¥12â¢â€–ğ’™tâˆ’ğ’™â‹†â€–2âˆ’Î·tâ¢â€–ğ’ˆtâ€–â¢â€–ğ’™tâˆ’ğ’™â‹†â€–+Î·t22â¢â€–ğ’ˆtâ€–2absent12superscriptnormsubscriptğ’™ğ‘¡superscriptğ’™â‹†2subscriptğœ‚ğ‘¡normsubscriptğ’ˆğ‘¡normsubscriptğ’™ğ‘¡superscriptğ’™â‹†superscriptsubscriptğœ‚ğ‘¡22superscriptnormsubscriptğ’ˆğ‘¡2\displaystyle\geq\frac{1}{2}\|\boldsymbol{x}_{t}-\boldsymbol{x}^{\star}\|^{2}-% \eta_{t}\|\boldsymbol{g}_{t}\|\|\boldsymbol{x}_{t}-\boldsymbol{x}^{\star}\|+% \frac{\eta_{t}^{2}}{2}\|\boldsymbol{g}_{t}\|^{2}â‰¥ divide start_ARG 1 end_ARG start_ARG 2 end_ARG âˆ¥ bold_italic_x start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT - bold_italic_x start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT â‹† end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT âˆ¥ start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT - italic_Î· start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT âˆ¥ bold_italic_g start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT âˆ¥ âˆ¥ bold_italic_x start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT - bold_italic_x start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT â‹† end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT âˆ¥ + divide start_ARG italic_Î· start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT end_ARG start_ARG 2 end_ARG âˆ¥ bold_italic_g start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT âˆ¥ start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT
=12â¢â€–ğ’™tâˆ’ğ’™â‹†â€–2âˆ’hâ¢(ğ’™t)â€–ğ’ˆtâ€–â¢â€–ğ’™tâˆ’ğ’™â‹†â€–+hâ¢(ğ’™t)22â¢â€–ğ’ˆtâ€–2absent12superscriptnormsubscriptğ’™ğ‘¡superscriptğ’™â‹†2â„subscriptğ’™ğ‘¡normsubscriptğ’ˆğ‘¡normsubscriptğ’™ğ‘¡superscriptğ’™â‹†â„superscriptsubscriptğ’™ğ‘¡22superscriptnormsubscriptğ’ˆğ‘¡2\displaystyle=\frac{1}{2}\|\boldsymbol{x}_{t}-\boldsymbol{x}^{\star}\|^{2}-% \frac{h(\boldsymbol{x}_{t})}{\|\boldsymbol{g}_{t}\|}\|\boldsymbol{x}_{t}-% \boldsymbol{x}^{\star}\|+\frac{h(\boldsymbol{x}_{t})^{2}}{2\|\boldsymbol{g}_{t% }\|^{2}}= divide start_ARG 1 end_ARG start_ARG 2 end_ARG âˆ¥ bold_italic_x start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT - bold_italic_x start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT â‹† end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT âˆ¥ start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT - divide start_ARG italic_h ( bold_italic_x start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ) end_ARG start_ARG âˆ¥ bold_italic_g start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT âˆ¥ end_ARG âˆ¥ bold_italic_x start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT - bold_italic_x start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT â‹† end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT âˆ¥ + divide start_ARG italic_h ( bold_italic_x start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ) start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT end_ARG start_ARG 2 âˆ¥ bold_italic_g start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT âˆ¥ start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT end_ARG
=12â¢â€–ğ’™tâˆ’ğ’™â‹†â€–2+hâ¢(ğ’™t)â€–ğ’ˆtâ€–â¢[hâ¢(ğ’™t)2â¢â€–ğ’ˆtâ€–âˆ’â€–ğ’™tâˆ’ğ’™â‹†â€–].absent12superscriptnormsubscriptğ’™ğ‘¡superscriptğ’™â‹†2â„subscriptğ’™ğ‘¡normsubscriptğ’ˆğ‘¡delimited-[]â„subscriptğ’™ğ‘¡2normsubscriptğ’ˆğ‘¡normsubscriptğ’™ğ‘¡superscriptğ’™â‹†\displaystyle=\frac{1}{2}\|\boldsymbol{x}_{t}-\boldsymbol{x}^{\star}\|^{2}+% \frac{h(\boldsymbol{x}_{t})}{\|\boldsymbol{g}_{t}\|}\left[\frac{h(\boldsymbol{% x}_{t})}{2\|\boldsymbol{g}_{t}\|}-\|\boldsymbol{x}_{t}-\boldsymbol{x}^{\star}% \|\right].= divide start_ARG 1 end_ARG start_ARG 2 end_ARG âˆ¥ bold_italic_x start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT - bold_italic_x start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT â‹† end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT âˆ¥ start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT + divide start_ARG italic_h ( bold_italic_x start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ) end_ARG start_ARG âˆ¥ bold_italic_g start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT âˆ¥ end_ARG [ divide start_ARG italic_h ( bold_italic_x start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ) end_ARG start_ARG 2 âˆ¥ bold_italic_g start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT âˆ¥ end_ARG - âˆ¥ bold_italic_x start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT - bold_italic_x start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT â‹† end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT âˆ¥ ] .

If hâ¢(ğ’™t)âˆ’hâ‹†<hâ‹†â¢Î¼8â¢Lâˆ’Î¼â„subscriptğ’™ğ‘¡superscriptâ„â‹†superscriptâ„â‹†ğœ‡8ğ¿ğœ‡h(\boldsymbol{x}_{t})-h^{\star}<h^{\star}\frac{\mu}{8L-\mu}italic_h ( bold_italic_x start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ) - italic_h start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT â‹† end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT < italic_h start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT â‹† end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT divide start_ARG italic_Î¼ end_ARG start_ARG 8 italic_L - italic_Î¼ end_ARG then we have by Lemma 4

hâ¢(ğ’™t)>(Î¼/(8â¢Lâˆ’Î¼)+1Î¼/(8â¢Lâˆ’Î¼))â¢(hâ¢(ğ’™t)âˆ’hâ‹†)=8â¢LÎ¼â¢(hâ¢(ğ’™t)âˆ’hâ‹†).â„subscriptğ’™ğ‘¡ğœ‡8ğ¿ğœ‡1ğœ‡8ğ¿ğœ‡â„subscriptğ’™ğ‘¡superscriptâ„â‹†8ğ¿ğœ‡â„subscriptğ’™ğ‘¡superscriptâ„â‹†\displaystyle h(\boldsymbol{x}_{t})>\left(\frac{\nicefrac{{\mu}}{{(8L-\mu)}}+1% }{\nicefrac{{\mu}}{{(8L-\mu)}}}\right)(h(\boldsymbol{x}_{t})-h^{\star})=\frac{% 8L}{\mu}(h(\boldsymbol{x}_{t})-h^{\star})~{}.italic_h ( bold_italic_x start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ) > ( divide start_ARG / start_ARG italic_Î¼ end_ARG start_ARG ( 8 italic_L - italic_Î¼ ) end_ARG + 1 end_ARG start_ARG / start_ARG italic_Î¼ end_ARG start_ARG ( 8 italic_L - italic_Î¼ ) end_ARG end_ARG ) ( italic_h ( bold_italic_x start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ) - italic_h start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT â‹† end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ) = divide start_ARG 8 italic_L end_ARG start_ARG italic_Î¼ end_ARG ( italic_h ( bold_italic_x start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ) - italic_h start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT â‹† end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ) .

Consequently,

hâ¢(ğ’™t)2â¢â€–ğ’ˆtâ€–â„subscriptğ’™ğ‘¡2normsubscriptğ’ˆğ‘¡\displaystyle\frac{h(\boldsymbol{x}_{t})}{2\|\boldsymbol{g}_{t}\|}divide start_ARG italic_h ( bold_italic_x start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ) end_ARG start_ARG 2 âˆ¥ bold_italic_g start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT âˆ¥ end_ARG >4â¢LÎ¼â¢(hâ¢(ğ’™t)âˆ’hâ¢(ğ’™â‹†))â€–ğ’ˆtâ€–â‰¥2â¢Lâ¢â€–ğ’™tâˆ’ğ’™â‹†â€–2â€–ğ’ˆtâ€–â‰¥â€–ğ’™tâˆ’ğ’™â‹†â€–.absent4ğ¿ğœ‡â„subscriptğ’™ğ‘¡â„superscriptğ’™â‹†normsubscriptğ’ˆğ‘¡2ğ¿superscriptnormsubscriptğ’™ğ‘¡superscriptğ’™â‹†2normsubscriptğ’ˆğ‘¡normsubscriptğ’™ğ‘¡superscriptğ’™â‹†\displaystyle>\frac{4L}{\mu}\frac{(h(\boldsymbol{x}_{t})-h(\boldsymbol{x}^{% \star}))}{\|\boldsymbol{g}_{t}\|}\geq 2L\frac{\|\boldsymbol{x}_{t}-\boldsymbol% {x}^{\star}\|^{2}}{\|\boldsymbol{g}_{t}\|}\geq\|\boldsymbol{x}_{t}-\boldsymbol% {x}^{\star}\|~{}.> divide start_ARG 4 italic_L end_ARG start_ARG italic_Î¼ end_ARG divide start_ARG ( italic_h ( bold_italic_x start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ) - italic_h ( bold_italic_x start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT â‹† end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ) ) end_ARG start_ARG âˆ¥ bold_italic_g start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT âˆ¥ end_ARG â‰¥ 2 italic_L divide start_ARG âˆ¥ bold_italic_x start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT - bold_italic_x start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT â‹† end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT âˆ¥ start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT end_ARG start_ARG âˆ¥ bold_italic_g start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT âˆ¥ end_ARG â‰¥ âˆ¥ bold_italic_x start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT - bold_italic_x start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT â‹† end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT âˆ¥ .

Where the last inequality follows from hâ„hitalic_h being self-bounded and convex,

12â¢Lâ¢â€–ğ’ˆtâ€–2â‰¤hâ¢(ğ’™t)âˆ’hâ‹†â‰¤âŸ¨ğ’ˆt,ğ’™tâˆ’ğ’™â‹†âŸ©â‰¤â€–ğ’ˆtâ€–â¢â€–ğ’™tâˆ’ğ’™â‹†â€–.âˆ12ğ¿superscriptnormsubscriptğ’ˆğ‘¡2â„subscriptğ’™ğ‘¡superscriptâ„â‹†subscriptğ’ˆğ‘¡subscriptğ’™ğ‘¡superscriptğ’™â‹†normsubscriptğ’ˆğ‘¡normsubscriptğ’™ğ‘¡superscriptğ’™â‹†\frac{1}{2L}\|\boldsymbol{g}_{t}\|^{2}\leq h(\boldsymbol{x}_{t})-h^{\star}\leq% \langle\boldsymbol{g}_{t},\boldsymbol{x}_{t}-\boldsymbol{x}^{\star}\rangle\leq% \|\boldsymbol{g}_{t}\|\|\boldsymbol{x}_{t}-\boldsymbol{x}^{\star}\|~{}.\qeddivide start_ARG 1 end_ARG start_ARG 2 italic_L end_ARG âˆ¥ bold_italic_g start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT âˆ¥ start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT â‰¤ italic_h ( bold_italic_x start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ) - italic_h start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT â‹† end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT â‰¤ âŸ¨ bold_italic_g start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT , bold_italic_x start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT - bold_italic_x start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT â‹† end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT âŸ© â‰¤ âˆ¥ bold_italic_g start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT âˆ¥ âˆ¥ bold_italic_x start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT - bold_italic_x start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT â‹† end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT âˆ¥ . italic_âˆ
Proposition 6.

Suppose hâ„hitalic_h is convex, strictly positive, Lğ¿Litalic_L-Lipschitz, and has a Î¼ğœ‡\muitalic_Î¼-sharp minimum hâ¢(ğ±)âˆ’hâ‹†â‰¥Î¼â¢â€–ğ±âˆ’ğ±â‹†â€–â„ğ±superscriptâ„â‹†ğœ‡normğ±superscriptğ±â‹†h(\boldsymbol{x})-h^{\star}\geq\mu\|\boldsymbol{x}-\boldsymbol{x}^{\star}\|italic_h ( bold_italic_x ) - italic_h start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT â‹† end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT â‰¥ italic_Î¼ âˆ¥ bold_italic_x - bold_italic_x start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT â‹† end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT âˆ¥, where ğ±â‹†=argâ¡minğ±â¡hâ¢(ğ±)superscriptğ±â‹†subscriptğ±â„ğ±\boldsymbol{x}^{\star}=\arg\min_{\boldsymbol{x}}h(\boldsymbol{x})bold_italic_x start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT â‹† end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT = roman_arg roman_min start_POSTSUBSCRIPT bold_italic_x end_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_h ( bold_italic_x ) is the only fixed point of TÂ (6). Then for any point ğ±âˆˆS={ğ²:ğ²â‰ ğ±â‹†,hâ¢(ğ²)âˆ’hâ‹†<hâ‹†â¢Î¼2â¢Lâˆ’Î¼}ğ±ğ‘†conditional-setğ²formulae-sequenceğ²superscriptğ±â‹†â„ğ²superscriptâ„â‹†superscriptâ„â‹†ğœ‡2ğ¿ğœ‡\boldsymbol{x}\in S=\{\boldsymbol{y}:\boldsymbol{y}\neq\boldsymbol{x}^{\star},% h(\boldsymbol{y})-h^{\star}<h^{\star}\frac{\mu}{2L-\mu}\}bold_italic_x âˆˆ italic_S = { bold_italic_y : bold_italic_y â‰  bold_italic_x start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT â‹† end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT , italic_h ( bold_italic_y ) - italic_h start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT â‹† end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT < italic_h start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT â‹† end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT divide start_ARG italic_Î¼ end_ARG start_ARG 2 italic_L - italic_Î¼ end_ARG } we have

â€–Tâ¢(ğ’™)âˆ’ğ’™â‹†â€–>â€–ğ’™âˆ’ğ’™â‹†â€–.normğ‘‡ğ’™superscriptğ’™â‹†normğ’™superscriptğ’™â‹†\|T(\boldsymbol{x})-\boldsymbol{x}^{\star}\|>\|\boldsymbol{x}-\boldsymbol{x}^{% \star}\|~{}.âˆ¥ italic_T ( bold_italic_x ) - bold_italic_x start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT â‹† end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT âˆ¥ > âˆ¥ bold_italic_x - bold_italic_x start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT â‹† end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT âˆ¥ .
Proof.

Let ğ’™tâˆˆSsubscriptğ’™ğ‘¡ğ‘†\boldsymbol{x}_{t}\in Sbold_italic_x start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT âˆˆ italic_S then by following similar steps to LemmaÂ 1 we have

12â¢â€–ğ’™t+1âˆ’ğ’™â‹†â€–212superscriptnormsubscriptğ’™ğ‘¡1superscriptğ’™â‹†2\displaystyle\frac{1}{2}\|\boldsymbol{x}_{t+1}-\boldsymbol{x}^{\star}\|^{2}divide start_ARG 1 end_ARG start_ARG 2 end_ARG âˆ¥ bold_italic_x start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t + 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT - bold_italic_x start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT â‹† end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT âˆ¥ start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT â‰¥12â¢â€–ğ’™tâˆ’ğ’™â‹†â€–2+hâ¢(ğ’™t)â€–ğ’ˆtâ€–â¢[hâ¢(ğ’™t)2â¢â€–ğ’ˆtâ€–âˆ’â€–ğ’™tâˆ’ğ’™â‹†â€–].absent12superscriptnormsubscriptğ’™ğ‘¡superscriptğ’™â‹†2â„subscriptğ’™ğ‘¡normsubscriptğ’ˆğ‘¡delimited-[]â„subscriptğ’™ğ‘¡2normsubscriptğ’ˆğ‘¡normsubscriptğ’™ğ‘¡superscriptğ’™â‹†\displaystyle\geq\frac{1}{2}\|\boldsymbol{x}_{t}-\boldsymbol{x}^{\star}\|^{2}+% \frac{h(\boldsymbol{x}_{t})}{\|\boldsymbol{g}_{t}\|}\left[\frac{h(\boldsymbol{% x}_{t})}{2\|\boldsymbol{g}_{t}\|}-\|\boldsymbol{x}_{t}-\boldsymbol{x}^{\star}% \|\right]~{}.â‰¥ divide start_ARG 1 end_ARG start_ARG 2 end_ARG âˆ¥ bold_italic_x start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT - bold_italic_x start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT â‹† end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT âˆ¥ start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT + divide start_ARG italic_h ( bold_italic_x start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ) end_ARG start_ARG âˆ¥ bold_italic_g start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT âˆ¥ end_ARG [ divide start_ARG italic_h ( bold_italic_x start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ) end_ARG start_ARG 2 âˆ¥ bold_italic_g start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT âˆ¥ end_ARG - âˆ¥ bold_italic_x start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT - bold_italic_x start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT â‹† end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT âˆ¥ ] .

By LemmaÂ 4, we have

hâ¢(ğ’™t)âˆ’hâ‹†<hâ‹†â¢Î¼2â¢Lâˆ’Î¼â„subscriptğ’™ğ‘¡superscriptâ„â‹†superscriptâ„â‹†ğœ‡2ğ¿ğœ‡\displaystyle h(\boldsymbol{x}_{t})-h^{\star}<h^{\star}\frac{\mu}{2L-\mu}italic_h ( bold_italic_x start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ) - italic_h start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT â‹† end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT < italic_h start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT â‹† end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT divide start_ARG italic_Î¼ end_ARG start_ARG 2 italic_L - italic_Î¼ end_ARG
â‡”hâ¢(ğ’™t)>(Î¼/(2â¢Lâˆ’Î¼)+1Î¼/(2â¢Lâˆ’Î¼))â¢(hâ¢(ğ’™t)âˆ’hâ‹†)=2â¢LÎ¼â¢(hâ¢(ğ’™t)âˆ’hâ‹†).â‡”absentâ„subscriptğ’™ğ‘¡ğœ‡2ğ¿ğœ‡1ğœ‡2ğ¿ğœ‡â„subscriptğ’™ğ‘¡superscriptâ„â‹†2ğ¿ğœ‡â„subscriptğ’™ğ‘¡superscriptâ„â‹†\displaystyle\Leftrightarrow h(\boldsymbol{x}_{t})>\left(\frac{\nicefrac{{\mu}% }{{(2L-\mu)}}+1}{\nicefrac{{\mu}}{{(2L-\mu)}}}\right)(h(\boldsymbol{x}_{t})-h^% {\star})=\frac{2L}{\mu}(h(\boldsymbol{x}_{t})-h^{\star})~{}.â‡” italic_h ( bold_italic_x start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ) > ( divide start_ARG / start_ARG italic_Î¼ end_ARG start_ARG ( 2 italic_L - italic_Î¼ ) end_ARG + 1 end_ARG start_ARG / start_ARG italic_Î¼ end_ARG start_ARG ( 2 italic_L - italic_Î¼ ) end_ARG end_ARG ) ( italic_h ( bold_italic_x start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ) - italic_h start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT â‹† end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ) = divide start_ARG 2 italic_L end_ARG start_ARG italic_Î¼ end_ARG ( italic_h ( bold_italic_x start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ) - italic_h start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT â‹† end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ) .

Therefore, by sharpness and Lipschitz property of hâ„hitalic_h, we have

hâ¢(ğ’™t)2â¢â€–ğ’ˆtâ€–>Lâ¢(hâ¢(ğ’™t)âˆ’hâ‹†)Î¼â¢â€–ğ’ˆtâ€–â‰¥Lâ¢â€–ğ’™âˆ’ğ’™â‹†â€–â€–ğ’ˆtâ€–â‰¥â€–ğ’™tâˆ’ğ’™â‹†â€–.âˆâ„subscriptğ’™ğ‘¡2normsubscriptğ’ˆğ‘¡ğ¿â„subscriptğ’™ğ‘¡superscriptâ„â‹†ğœ‡normsubscriptğ’ˆğ‘¡ğ¿normğ’™superscriptğ’™â‹†normsubscriptğ’ˆğ‘¡normsubscriptğ’™ğ‘¡superscriptğ’™â‹†\frac{h(\boldsymbol{x}_{t})}{2\|\boldsymbol{g}_{t}\|}>\frac{L(h(\boldsymbol{x}% _{t})-h^{\star})}{\mu\|\boldsymbol{g}_{t}\|}\geq\frac{L\|\boldsymbol{x}-% \boldsymbol{x}^{\star}\|}{\|\boldsymbol{g}_{t}\|}\geq\|\boldsymbol{x}_{t}-% \boldsymbol{x}^{\star}\|~{}.\qeddivide start_ARG italic_h ( bold_italic_x start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ) end_ARG start_ARG 2 âˆ¥ bold_italic_g start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT âˆ¥ end_ARG > divide start_ARG italic_L ( italic_h ( bold_italic_x start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ) - italic_h start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT â‹† end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ) end_ARG start_ARG italic_Î¼ âˆ¥ bold_italic_g start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT âˆ¥ end_ARG â‰¥ divide start_ARG italic_L âˆ¥ bold_italic_x - bold_italic_x start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT â‹† end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT âˆ¥ end_ARG start_ARG âˆ¥ bold_italic_g start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT âˆ¥ end_ARG â‰¥ âˆ¥ bold_italic_x start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT - bold_italic_x start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT â‹† end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT âˆ¥ . italic_âˆ
Proposition 2 (Cycling and failure to converge).

There exists a strictly positive smooth and strongly convex function hâ„hitalic_h, and initial point ğ±1subscriptğ±1\boldsymbol{x}_{1}bold_italic_x start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT such that iterates from update (6) cycle and satisfy the inequality hâ¢(1tâ¢âˆ‘i=1tğ±i)âˆ’hâ‹†â‰¥Î´>0â„1ğ‘¡superscriptsubscriptğ‘–1ğ‘¡subscriptğ±ğ‘–superscriptâ„â‹†ğ›¿0h(\frac{1}{t}\sum_{i=1}^{t}\boldsymbol{x}_{i})-h^{\star}\geq\delta>0italic_h ( divide start_ARG 1 end_ARG start_ARG italic_t end_ARG âˆ‘ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i = 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT bold_italic_x start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ) - italic_h start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT â‹† end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT â‰¥ italic_Î´ > 0 for all tğ‘¡titalic_t.

Proof.

The proof is constructive: consider h:â„â†’â„,hâ¢(x)=x2+1:â„formulae-sequenceâ†’â„â„â„ğ‘¥superscriptğ‘¥21h:\mathbb{R}\to\mathbb{R},h(x)=x^{2}+1italic_h : blackboard_R â†’ blackboard_R , italic_h ( italic_x ) = italic_x start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT + 1, so hâ‹†=1superscriptâ„â‹†1h^{\star}=1italic_h start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT â‹† end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT = 1. Observe that the update is

xt+1=xtâˆ’xt2+12â¢xt=xt2âˆ’12â¢xt.subscriptğ‘¥ğ‘¡1subscriptğ‘¥ğ‘¡superscriptsubscriptğ‘¥ğ‘¡212subscriptğ‘¥ğ‘¡superscriptsubscriptğ‘¥ğ‘¡212subscriptğ‘¥ğ‘¡x_{t+1}=x_{t}-\frac{x_{t}^{2}+1}{2x_{t}}=\frac{x_{t}^{2}-1}{2x_{t}}~{}.italic_x start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t + 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT = italic_x start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT - divide start_ARG italic_x start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT + 1 end_ARG start_ARG 2 italic_x start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT end_ARG = divide start_ARG italic_x start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT - 1 end_ARG start_ARG 2 italic_x start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT end_ARG .

Now, we want to choose x1subscriptğ‘¥1x_{1}italic_x start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT so that we oscillate between 3 possible values.

Set x1=cotâ¡Î¸subscriptğ‘¥1ğœƒx_{1}=\cot\thetaitalic_x start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT = roman_cot italic_Î¸ where Î¸ğœƒ\thetaitalic_Î¸ has to be determined. The update becomes

x2=x12âˆ’12â¢x1=cot2â¡Î¸âˆ’12â¢cotâ¡Î¸=cotâ¡(2â¢Î¸),subscriptğ‘¥2superscriptsubscriptğ‘¥1212subscriptğ‘¥1superscript2ğœƒ12ğœƒ2ğœƒx_{2}=\frac{x_{1}^{2}-1}{2x_{1}}=\frac{\cot^{2}\theta-1}{2\cot\theta}=\cot(2% \theta),italic_x start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT = divide start_ARG italic_x start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT - 1 end_ARG start_ARG 2 italic_x start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT end_ARG = divide start_ARG roman_cot start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_Î¸ - 1 end_ARG start_ARG 2 roman_cot italic_Î¸ end_ARG = roman_cot ( 2 italic_Î¸ ) ,

where in the last equality we used the identity for cot\cotroman_cot. Hence, we have xt=cotâ¡(2tâ¢Î¸)subscriptğ‘¥ğ‘¡superscript2ğ‘¡ğœƒx_{t}=\cot(2^{t}\theta)italic_x start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT = roman_cot ( 2 start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_Î¸ ). Given that we want to oscillate between 3 values, we want xt+3=xtsubscriptğ‘¥ğ‘¡3subscriptğ‘¥ğ‘¡x_{t+3}=x_{t}italic_x start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t + 3 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT = italic_x start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT, that is, cotâ¡(2t+3â¢Î¸)=cotâ¡(2tâ¢Î¸)superscript2ğ‘¡3ğœƒsuperscript2ğ‘¡ğœƒ\cot(2^{t+3}\theta)=\cot(2^{t}\theta)roman_cot ( 2 start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_t + 3 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_Î¸ ) = roman_cot ( 2 start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_Î¸ ). We can achieve it if we select Î¸=Ï€/7ğœƒğœ‹7\theta=\pi/7italic_Î¸ = italic_Ï€ / 7. Indeed, we have

x1subscriptğ‘¥1\displaystyle x_{1}italic_x start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT =cotâ¡(Ï€/7)absentğœ‹7\displaystyle=\cot(\pi/7)= roman_cot ( italic_Ï€ / 7 )
x2subscriptğ‘¥2\displaystyle x_{2}italic_x start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT =cotâ¡(2â¢Ï€/7)absent2ğœ‹7\displaystyle=\cot(2\pi/7)= roman_cot ( 2 italic_Ï€ / 7 )
x3subscriptğ‘¥3\displaystyle x_{3}italic_x start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 3 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT =cotâ¡(4â¢Ï€/7)absent4ğœ‹7\displaystyle=\cot(4\pi/7)= roman_cot ( 4 italic_Ï€ / 7 )
x5subscriptğ‘¥5\displaystyle x_{5}italic_x start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 5 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT =cotâ¡(8â¢Ï€/7)=cotâ¡(Ï€+Ï€/7)=cotâ¡(Ï€/7)=x1.absent8ğœ‹7ğœ‹ğœ‹7ğœ‹7subscriptğ‘¥1\displaystyle=\cot(8\pi/7)=\cot(\pi+\pi/7)=\cot(\pi/7)=x_{1}~{}.= roman_cot ( 8 italic_Ï€ / 7 ) = roman_cot ( italic_Ï€ + italic_Ï€ / 7 ) = roman_cot ( italic_Ï€ / 7 ) = italic_x start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT .

Finally, one can verify numerically that fâ¢(1tâ¢âˆ‘i=1txt)âˆ’fâ‹†>0.77ğ‘“1ğ‘¡superscriptsubscriptğ‘–1ğ‘¡subscriptğ‘¥ğ‘¡superscriptğ‘“â‹†0.77f(\frac{1}{t}\sum_{i=1}^{t}x_{t})-f^{\star}>0.77italic_f ( divide start_ARG 1 end_ARG start_ARG italic_t end_ARG âˆ‘ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i = 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_x start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ) - italic_f start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT â‹† end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT > 0.77. âˆ

Lemma 5.

There exists subregions within the unstable regions in Propositions Â 1 and Â 6 where the stepsizes are upper bounded.

Proof.

By convexity of hâ„hitalic_h we have hâˆ’hâ‹†â‰¤âŸ¨ğ’ˆt,ğ’™tâˆ’ğ’™â‹†âŸ©â‰¤â€–ğ’ˆtâ€–â¢â€–ğ’™tâˆ’ğ’™â‹†â€–â„superscriptâ„â‹†subscriptğ’ˆğ‘¡subscriptğ’™ğ‘¡superscriptğ’™â‹†normsubscriptğ’ˆğ‘¡normsubscriptğ’™ğ‘¡superscriptğ’™â‹†h-h^{\star}\leq\langle\boldsymbol{g}_{t},\boldsymbol{x}_{t}-\boldsymbol{x}^{% \star}\rangle\leq\|\boldsymbol{g}_{t}\|\|\boldsymbol{x}_{t}-\boldsymbol{x}^{% \star}\|italic_h - italic_h start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT â‹† end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT â‰¤ âŸ¨ bold_italic_g start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT , bold_italic_x start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT - bold_italic_x start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT â‹† end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT âŸ© â‰¤ âˆ¥ bold_italic_g start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT âˆ¥ âˆ¥ bold_italic_x start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT - bold_italic_x start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT â‹† end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT âˆ¥, so â€–ğ’ˆtâ€–â‰¥hâ¢(ğ’™)âˆ’hâ‹†â€–ğ’™tâˆ’ğ’™â‹†â€–normsubscriptğ’ˆğ‘¡â„ğ’™superscriptâ„â‹†normsubscriptğ’™ğ‘¡superscriptğ’™â‹†\|\boldsymbol{g}_{t}\|\geq\frac{h(\boldsymbol{x})-h^{\star}}{\|\boldsymbol{x}_% {t}-\boldsymbol{x}^{\star}\|}âˆ¥ bold_italic_g start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT âˆ¥ â‰¥ divide start_ARG italic_h ( bold_italic_x ) - italic_h start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT â‹† end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT end_ARG start_ARG âˆ¥ bold_italic_x start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT - bold_italic_x start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT â‹† end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT âˆ¥ end_ARG. By assumption in Lemmas Â 1 and Â 6 the unstable region is S={ğ’™:hâ¢(ğ’™)âˆ’hâ‹†<câ¢hâ‹†}ğ‘†conditional-setğ’™â„ğ’™superscriptâ„â‹†ğ‘superscriptâ„â‹†S=\{\boldsymbol{x}:h(\boldsymbol{x})-h^{\star}<ch^{\star}\}italic_S = { bold_italic_x : italic_h ( bold_italic_x ) - italic_h start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT â‹† end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT < italic_c italic_h start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT â‹† end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT } where cğ‘citalic_c depends on the properties of hâ„hitalic_h. Therefore, for ğ’™âˆˆSğ’™ğ‘†\boldsymbol{x}\in Sbold_italic_x âˆˆ italic_S and denoting ğ’ˆâˆˆâˆ‚hâ¢(ğ’™)ğ’ˆâ„ğ’™\boldsymbol{g}\in\partial h(\boldsymbol{x})bold_italic_g âˆˆ âˆ‚ italic_h ( bold_italic_x ) as any subgradient at ğ’™ğ’™\boldsymbol{x}bold_italic_x, we have

hâ¢(ğ’™)â€–ğ’ˆâ€–2â„ğ’™superscriptnormğ’ˆ2\displaystyle\frac{h(\boldsymbol{x})}{\|\boldsymbol{g}\|^{2}}divide start_ARG italic_h ( bold_italic_x ) end_ARG start_ARG âˆ¥ bold_italic_g âˆ¥ start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT end_ARG â‰¤hâ¢(ğ’™)â¢â€–ğ’™âˆ’ğ’™â‹†â€–2(hâ¢(ğ’™)âˆ’hâ‹†)2<(c+1)â¢hâ‹†â¢â€–ğ’™âˆ’ğ’™â‹†â€–2(hâ¢(ğ’™)âˆ’hâ‹†)2.absentâ„ğ’™superscriptnormğ’™superscriptğ’™â‹†2superscriptâ„ğ’™superscriptâ„â‹†2ğ‘1superscriptâ„â‹†superscriptnormğ’™superscriptğ’™â‹†2superscriptâ„ğ’™superscriptâ„â‹†2\displaystyle\leq\frac{h(\boldsymbol{x})\|\boldsymbol{x}-\boldsymbol{x}^{\star% }\|^{2}}{(h(\boldsymbol{x})-h^{\star})^{2}}<\frac{(c+1)h^{\star}\|\boldsymbol{% x}-\boldsymbol{x}^{\star}\|^{2}}{(h(\boldsymbol{x})-h^{\star})^{2}}~{}.â‰¤ divide start_ARG italic_h ( bold_italic_x ) âˆ¥ bold_italic_x - bold_italic_x start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT â‹† end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT âˆ¥ start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT end_ARG start_ARG ( italic_h ( bold_italic_x ) - italic_h start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT â‹† end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ) start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT end_ARG < divide start_ARG ( italic_c + 1 ) italic_h start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT â‹† end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT âˆ¥ bold_italic_x - bold_italic_x start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT â‹† end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT âˆ¥ start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT end_ARG start_ARG ( italic_h ( bold_italic_x ) - italic_h start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT â‹† end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ) start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT end_ARG .

If hâ„hitalic_h has a sharp minimum, hâ¢(ğ’™)âˆ’hâ‹†â‰¥Î¼â¢â€–ğ’™âˆ’ğ’™â‹†â€–â„ğ’™superscriptâ„â‹†ğœ‡normğ’™superscriptğ’™â‹†h(\boldsymbol{x})-h^{\star}\geq\mu\|\boldsymbol{x}-\boldsymbol{x}^{\star}\|italic_h ( bold_italic_x ) - italic_h start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT â‹† end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT â‰¥ italic_Î¼ âˆ¥ bold_italic_x - bold_italic_x start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT â‹† end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT âˆ¥, then we have hâ¢(ğ’™)â€–ğ’ˆtâ€–2<c+1Î¼2â¢hâ‹†â„ğ’™superscriptnormsubscriptğ’ˆğ‘¡2ğ‘1superscriptğœ‡2superscriptâ„â‹†\frac{h(\boldsymbol{x})}{\|\boldsymbol{g}_{t}\|^{2}}<\frac{c+1}{\mu^{2}}h^{\star}divide start_ARG italic_h ( bold_italic_x ) end_ARG start_ARG âˆ¥ bold_italic_g start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT âˆ¥ start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT end_ARG < divide start_ARG italic_c + 1 end_ARG start_ARG italic_Î¼ start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT end_ARG italic_h start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT â‹† end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT. Therefore, the stepsizes are always bounded within S.

Now consider the subregion Sk={ğ’™:hâ¢(ğ’™)âˆ’hâ‹†<ckâ¢hâ‹†}subscriptğ‘†ğ‘˜conditional-setğ’™â„ğ’™superscriptâ„â‹†ğ‘ğ‘˜superscriptâ„â‹†S_{k}=\{\boldsymbol{x}:h(\boldsymbol{x})-h^{\star}<\frac{c}{k}h^{\star}\}italic_S start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_k end_POSTSUBSCRIPT = { bold_italic_x : italic_h ( bold_italic_x ) - italic_h start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT â‹† end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT < divide start_ARG italic_c end_ARG start_ARG italic_k end_ARG italic_h start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT â‹† end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT } for some k>1ğ‘˜1k>1italic_k > 1. Consider ğ’™âˆˆSâˆ–Skğ’™ğ‘†subscriptğ‘†ğ‘˜\boldsymbol{x}\in S\setminus S_{k}bold_italic_x âˆˆ italic_S âˆ– italic_S start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_k end_POSTSUBSCRIPT, that is (1+ck)â¢hâˆ—â‰¤hâ¢(ğ’™)â‰¤(1+c)â¢hâˆ—1ğ‘ğ‘˜superscriptâ„âˆ—â„ğ’™1ğ‘superscriptâ„âˆ—(1+\frac{c}{k})h^{\ast}\leq h(\boldsymbol{x})\leq(1+c)h^{\ast}( 1 + divide start_ARG italic_c end_ARG start_ARG italic_k end_ARG ) italic_h start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT âˆ— end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT â‰¤ italic_h ( bold_italic_x ) â‰¤ ( 1 + italic_c ) italic_h start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT âˆ— end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT. If hâ„hitalic_h statisfies the quadratic growth condition hâ¢(ğ’™)âˆ’hâ‹†â‰¥Î¼2â¢â€–ğ’™âˆ’ğ’™â‹†â€–2â„ğ’™superscriptâ„â‹†ğœ‡2superscriptnormğ’™superscriptğ’™â‹†2h(\boldsymbol{x})-h^{\star}\geq\frac{\mu}{2}\|\boldsymbol{x}-\boldsymbol{x}^{% \star}\|^{2}italic_h ( bold_italic_x ) - italic_h start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT â‹† end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT â‰¥ divide start_ARG italic_Î¼ end_ARG start_ARG 2 end_ARG âˆ¥ bold_italic_x - bold_italic_x start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT â‹† end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT âˆ¥ start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT then

hâ¢(ğ’™)â€–ğ’ˆâ€–2<(c+1)â¢hâ‹†â¢â€–ğ’™âˆ’ğ’™â‹†â€–2(hâ¢(ğ’™)âˆ’hâ‹†)2â‰¤2â¢(c+1)â¢hâ‹†Î¼â¢(hâ¢(ğ’™)âˆ’hâ‹†)â‰¤2â¢kâ¢(c+1)Î¼â¢c.â„ğ’™superscriptnormğ’ˆ2ğ‘1superscriptâ„â‹†superscriptnormğ’™superscriptğ’™â‹†2superscriptâ„ğ’™superscriptâ„â‹†22ğ‘1superscriptâ„â‹†ğœ‡â„ğ’™superscriptâ„â‹†2ğ‘˜ğ‘1ğœ‡ğ‘\displaystyle\frac{h(\boldsymbol{x})}{\|\boldsymbol{g}\|^{2}}<\frac{(c+1)h^{% \star}\|\boldsymbol{x}-\boldsymbol{x}^{\star}\|^{2}}{(h(\boldsymbol{x})-h^{% \star})^{2}}\leq\frac{2(c+1)h^{\star}}{\mu(h(\boldsymbol{x})-h^{\star})}\leq% \frac{2k(c+1)}{\mu c}~{}.divide start_ARG italic_h ( bold_italic_x ) end_ARG start_ARG âˆ¥ bold_italic_g âˆ¥ start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT end_ARG < divide start_ARG ( italic_c + 1 ) italic_h start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT â‹† end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT âˆ¥ bold_italic_x - bold_italic_x start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT â‹† end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT âˆ¥ start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT end_ARG start_ARG ( italic_h ( bold_italic_x ) - italic_h start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT â‹† end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ) start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT end_ARG â‰¤ divide start_ARG 2 ( italic_c + 1 ) italic_h start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT â‹† end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT end_ARG start_ARG italic_Î¼ ( italic_h ( bold_italic_x ) - italic_h start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT â‹† end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ) end_ARG â‰¤ divide start_ARG 2 italic_k ( italic_c + 1 ) end_ARG start_ARG italic_Î¼ italic_c end_ARG . (9)

Where the last inequality follows since ğ’™âˆ‰Skğ’™subscriptğ‘†ğ‘˜\boldsymbol{x}\notin S_{k}bold_italic_x âˆ‰ italic_S start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_k end_POSTSUBSCRIPT. Therefore, stepsize is bounded within Sâˆ–Skğ‘†subscriptğ‘†ğ‘˜S\setminus S_{k}italic_S âˆ– italic_S start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_k end_POSTSUBSCRIPT, and grows as we increase kğ‘˜kitalic_k. âˆ

Lemma 6.

Let T:â„nâ†’â„n:ğ‘‡â†’superscriptâ„ğ‘›superscriptâ„ğ‘›T:\mathbb{R}^{n}\to\mathbb{R}^{n}italic_T : blackboard_R start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_n end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT â†’ blackboard_R start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_n end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT with a unique fixed point ğ±â‹†superscriptğ±â‹†\boldsymbol{x}^{\star}bold_italic_x start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT â‹† end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT. If ğ±â‹†superscriptğ±â‹†\boldsymbol{x}^{\star}bold_italic_x start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT â‹† end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT is unstable, that is, there exists Î´ğ›¿\deltaitalic_Î´ such that ğ±â‰ ğ±â‹†ğ±superscriptğ±â‹†\boldsymbol{x}\neq\boldsymbol{x}^{\star}bold_italic_x â‰  bold_italic_x start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT â‹† end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT and â€–ğ±âˆ’ğ±â‹†â€–â‰¤Î´normğ±superscriptğ±â‹†ğ›¿\|\boldsymbol{x}-\boldsymbol{x}^{\star}\|\leq\deltaâˆ¥ bold_italic_x - bold_italic_x start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT â‹† end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT âˆ¥ â‰¤ italic_Î´, then â€–Tâ¢(ğ±)âˆ’ğ±â‹†â€–>â€–ğ±âˆ’ğ±â‹†â€–normğ‘‡ğ±superscriptğ±â‹†normğ±superscriptğ±â‹†\|T(\boldsymbol{x})-\boldsymbol{x}^{\star}\|>\|\boldsymbol{x}-\boldsymbol{x}^{% \star}\|âˆ¥ italic_T ( bold_italic_x ) - bold_italic_x start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT â‹† end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT âˆ¥ > âˆ¥ bold_italic_x - bold_italic_x start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT â‹† end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT âˆ¥. Define Tâˆ’1superscriptğ‘‡1T^{-1}italic_T start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT - 1 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT over a set SâŠ†â„nğ‘†superscriptâ„ğ‘›S\subseteq\mathbb{R}^{n}italic_S âŠ† blackboard_R start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_n end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT as Tâˆ’1â¢(S)={ğ±:Tâ¢(ğ±)âˆˆS}superscriptğ‘‡1ğ‘†conditional-setğ±ğ‘‡ğ±ğ‘†T^{-1}(S)=\{\boldsymbol{x}:T(\boldsymbol{x})\in S\}italic_T start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT - 1 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ( italic_S ) = { bold_italic_x : italic_T ( bold_italic_x ) âˆˆ italic_S }. If Tâˆ’kâ¢({ğ±â‹†})superscriptğ‘‡ğ‘˜superscriptğ±â‹†T^{-k}(\{\boldsymbol{x}^{\star}\})italic_T start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT - italic_k end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ( { bold_italic_x start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT â‹† end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT } ) is of measure zero for any kğ‘˜kitalic_k, then

Pâ¢(limtâ†’âˆğ’™t=ğ’™â‹†)=0.ğ‘ƒsubscriptâ†’ğ‘¡subscriptğ’™ğ‘¡superscriptğ’™â‹†0P\left(\lim_{t\to\infty}\boldsymbol{x}_{t}=\boldsymbol{x}^{\star}\right)=0~{}.italic_P ( roman_lim start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t â†’ âˆ end_POSTSUBSCRIPT bold_italic_x start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT = bold_italic_x start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT â‹† end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ) = 0 .

In other words, the set of initializations that can converge to the optimal solution has measure zero.

Proof.

We divide â„nsuperscriptâ„ğ‘›\mathbb{R}^{n}blackboard_R start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_n end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT into two sets, S=â‹ƒk=1âˆTâˆ’kâ¢({ğ’™â‹†})ğ‘†superscriptsubscriptğ‘˜1superscriptğ‘‡ğ‘˜superscriptğ’™â‹†S=\bigcup_{k=1}^{\infty}T^{-k}(\{\boldsymbol{x}^{\star}\})italic_S = â‹ƒ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_k = 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT âˆ end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_T start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT - italic_k end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ( { bold_italic_x start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT â‹† end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT } ), and its compliment Scsuperscriptğ‘†ğ‘S^{c}italic_S start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_c end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT. Sğ‘†Sitalic_S represents the points that can exactly reach the unique minimizer ğ’™â‹†superscriptğ’™â‹†\boldsymbol{x}^{\star}bold_italic_x start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT â‹† end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT. If Tkâ¢({ğ’™â‹†})superscriptğ‘‡ğ‘˜superscriptğ’™â‹†T^{k}(\{\boldsymbol{x}^{\star}\})italic_T start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_k end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ( { bold_italic_x start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT â‹† end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT } ) is a null set for every kğ‘˜kitalic_k then so is Sğ‘†Sitalic_S since the countable union of null sets is a null set.

Now we show that for all initializations in ğ’™1âˆˆScsubscriptğ’™1superscriptğ‘†ğ‘\boldsymbol{x}_{1}\in S^{c}bold_italic_x start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT âˆˆ italic_S start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_c end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT, ğ’™1subscriptğ’™1\boldsymbol{x}_{1}bold_italic_x start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT cannot converge to ğ’™â‹†superscriptğ’™â‹†\boldsymbol{x}^{\star}bold_italic_x start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT â‹† end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT. Suppose the contrary, limtâ†’âˆğ’™t=ğ’™â‹†subscriptâ†’ğ‘¡subscriptğ’™ğ‘¡superscriptğ’™â‹†\lim_{t\to\infty}\boldsymbol{x}_{t}=\boldsymbol{x}^{\star}roman_lim start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t â†’ âˆ end_POSTSUBSCRIPT bold_italic_x start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_t end_POSTSUBSCRIPT = bold_italic_x start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT â‹† end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT. Let B={ğ’š:ğ’šâ‰ ğ’™â‹†,â€–ğ’™âˆ’ğ’™â‹†â€–â‰¤Î´}ğµconditional-setğ’šformulae-sequenceğ’šsuperscriptğ’™â‹†normğ’™superscriptğ’™â‹†ğ›¿B=\{\boldsymbol{y}:\boldsymbol{y}\neq\boldsymbol{x}^{\star},\|\boldsymbol{x}-% \boldsymbol{x}^{\star}\|\leq\delta\}italic_B = { bold_italic_y : bold_italic_y â‰  bold_italic_x start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT â‹† end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT , âˆ¥ bold_italic_x - bold_italic_x start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT â‹† end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT âˆ¥ â‰¤ italic_Î´ }.
